name: Moon Ball
description:
Moon Ball is a small experiment I've been playing with that I decided to release!

You can see a playthrough below, but keep in mind, SPOILERS!:

Most Sounds from Freesound.Org but if you make it to heaven, all that is Pink Noise Ordinance!

I *LOVE* Rocket League, more than pretty much any other game in the world, and was wondering if I could make some sort of game that was based on driving, but also was about launching from one spot to another!

Growing up BMXing, I always loved the riders who didn't even really do 'tricks' but rather flowed around space, using obstacles and ramps to look like they were flying. Basically I wanted to make you feel like Sergio Layos, Ruben Alcantara, Chase Hawk or Tommy Dugan  ( sorry about the long intro ):

 

If you have never played rocket league, I'm not going to lie, the controls will probably be hard to use! this is my first attempt at making a game for gamepad, and I did my best, but sometimes our best just isn't enough!

Anyway, have fun, and enjoy  MOON BALL!

Although it is *MASSIVELY* disorganized, and doesn't have much useful, the code is up over here: https://github.com/cabbibo/moonBall1 if you are into that kind of thing!
